title: Go Home Annie
description: Take on the role of Annie, a low level employee of the SCP Foundation , a covert organization meant to secure and contain anomalous entities and protect the general public from them. Why has an organization with the motto “Secure, Contain, Protect” created a division for replicating dangerous paranormal events and anomalous entities? Why are you tasked with repeatedly testing the same replicas , with a seemingly never changing outcome? You will need to take drastic actions to uncover your true purpose and alter the course of your fate.

system_requirements.Processor: 4th gen Intel i5 or AMD equivalent
system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
